New Records: Rilee Rossouw scored 109 runs off 56 balls
Anrich Nortje took a four-wicket haul
South Africa scored 205 for five in 20 overs
Key Match Events: Notable wickets fell at crucial moments
The match was part of the T20 World Cup 2022 Super 12 stage
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at the SCG in Sydney
